I’m David Paulsson

A typical Swedish guy who’s passionate about interface design, typography, usability and WordPress.

About me

It takes skills to pay the bills.

Hi! My name is David Paulsson and I’m currently employed by Valtech and working in Stockholm, Sweden. For the last couple of years I’ve specialized more and more towards front end development, but I also have a background as an illustrator and print designer.

I have worked with digital interfaces since 2006 and before that I was a self employed designer/illustrator creating CD/DVD album art and event posters for some of Swedens biggest music groups and booking agencies.

In college I studied cognitive science, techical illustration and information architecture.

In private

I live in Västerås, Sweden, with my wife Yaty. The last ten years I’ve also been working as a DJ and club promoter together with @tommyisacsson, arranging events all over Sweden. Much of my spare time is devoted to various side projects as I don’t really like just sittin’ around. In general (painting with broad strokes) I like good coffee, interior design, to eat well and travel often.

Recommendations

David is a solid and hardworking developer! We worked together with the new website for Ametist Azordegan and it was a charm watching my pixels become the site. I know we will work more together in the future and you should too!

Niklas Rosén
Designer at The World Loves

I found Davids profile here on LinkedIn and jumped at the chance to hire him. Since then he has been the cornerstone of the social media services at our agency, and has excellent skills in both digital design and development. He is always up to date with the web and has strong opinions, which is great since he tends to be right. :) Excellent guy to have around!

Erik Stridell
Online business developer at byBrick Interface

That’s nice, honey.

Mom

David is an extremely talented person with great knowledge in his field, and curiosity and drive to explore new tools for his work. In addition he has good common sense and judgement in taking measures to solve the problems he faces. He is also a great personality, which you like to have around you. Simply put—a great colleague and friend.

2013 WordPress Design Development

Frontit offers consulting services in management, project and program management, and training. Their new site lists upcoming seminars and reflects their brand in a modern way.

Swedens largest hiphop export. Together with the group I’ve been in charge of their website and Facebook page (with 75k+ likes) for several years.

Itrim

The world's best solution to one of the world's greatest challenges.

2013 EpiServer Design Development

Would you be amazed if you lost 25 pounds in 12 weeks safely? Itrim is a global weight loss company founded in Sweden. When they changed platform to EpiServer7 I helped their team with the design and then produced the front end templates for their external and internal web sites.

Visit site

Nya Filmstaden

Welcome to the Neighborhood

2012 Design Development

Welcome to the new amusement part in Västerås, Sweden. The theme is food & entertainment, and the new multiplex cinema is the most modern, fully digital cinema complex is Sweden.

Visit site

Yes! in Concert

Last night Yes! saved my life.

2011 WordPress Development

Yes! in concert, a hiphop club in Stockholm Sweden that has been around since the early 90′s and has played a big part in building the hiphop scene in Sweden. Design by Niklas Rosén.

Visit site

Berättarministeriet

All children carry dreams, ideas, thoughts, opinions and experiences.

2011 WordPress Development

Berättarministeriet is a nonprofit organization dedicated to inspire children, aged 8-18, from areas of high unemployment to conquer the written word. Their work is based on the understanding that strong writing skills are fundamental for participation in a democratic and pluralistic society.

Their new site site was developed together with Happy F&B and display an ever growing library of the children’s stories.

Visit site

Evolution Hiphop

Swedish Hiphop compilation.

2010 WordPress Development

Evolution Hiphop is a project presented by Ametist Azordegan, Redline Records and Salazar Brothers and was released in September 2010.

The collection contains the largest majority of exclusively recorded songs and is a collector’s item for anyone who is interested in the Swedish hiphop scene. The hope is that there will be yet another compilation album with the same purpose in ten years, and that it thereby creates a reference points for the genre in Sweden. Design by Niklas Rosén.

Visit site

Ametist Azordegan

Music journalist, radio host at Swedish National Radio, DJ and former blogger at MTV.

2009 WordPress Development

Custom WordPress theme for Ametist Azordegan. Design by Niklas Rosén.

Blog

A journal of sorts.

23 Aug 2013

How to: sensible default typography with a vertical rhythm

In order to help your users to read and interpret your content there are a few tricks we can pull out when designing websites. First off, we have to make sure the font is large enough to read, that there’s enough contrast between the body text color and the background, that the lines of text in each row aren’t too long (about 45-65 characters is optimal) and then there’s to set up a typographic rhythm that helps your users to read.

22 Aug 2013

I’m joining Valtech!

As of September 2nd I’ll be employed as a front end developer at Valtech, and I’m super excited.

30 Jul 2013

Look, ma! No database!

It’s portfolio redesign season and I’ve gone static. I’ve ditched Wordpress in favor of Jekyll. And from now on I’m going to be writing in English only. Ooh, I did not see myself doing this a year ago.

Contact me

Send me an email or tweet, let’s be friends.

david@davidpaulsson.se @davidpaulsson

This site is built with Jekyll and hosted on FSData. Last updated 13 December 2013. Aktiv Grotesk Std and FF Tisa Pro served by Typekit. Lots of ♥ to SASS & Compass. The source code is on Github if you want to poke about or submit a bug.
